name: Harvest Wood
description:
Playing like an old woodcutter. He needs wood to warm his home and don't die by deadly night or for the dangerous wolves.

During the day he must to collect firewood cutting the trees he has outside. While the wood is fallong arround him, the beavers can steal it, so you have to follow them to have it back.  At 17pm, the night starts, so you must to go home or the wolves will start to hunt you. If you don't have wood enought, you won't be able to get in home and cold or wolves will kill you.

CREDITS:
